entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening and before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
